Name: USB Hub Switch
Description: 4 port USB 2.0 switch with independent port control.

Name: AC Power Switch (1 Port)
Description: Single 15-amp NEMA 5-15R with blown fuse indicator. Rated for inductive loads like motors up to 1HP.

Name: AC Power Switch (4 Port)
Description: 4 port AC power strip. Each NEMA 5-15R rated for 10A resistive load. Blown fuse indicator on each port.

Name: AC Contactor Switch
Description: Switches up to 10A at 250V for integration into larger systems.

Name: Passive Router
Description: Passively connects the Core to up to 3 other components. All pins shared to all components.
